casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Cincinnati Enquirer v. Allen, Judge.

[Cite as State ex rel. Cincinnati Enquirer v. Allen, 132 Ohio St.3d 126, 2012-Ohio-2571.]

(No. 2011-1643 Submitted May 22, 2012 Decided June 13, 2012.) Graydon Head & Ritchey, L.L.P., and John C. Greiner, for relators. Joseph T. Deters, Hamilton County Prosecuting Attorney, and Christian J. Schaefer, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for respondent.

{¶ 1} Upon consideration of the parties’ evidence and briefs, this cause is dismissed based on mootness.

O’Connor, C.J., and Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Donnell, Lanzinger, Cupp, and McGee Brown, JJ., concur.
